channel.title: Need Hamachi Help
channel.description:
ok, i have hamachi on my laptop (easy as pie) but my problem is getting hamachi for my intel based mac (OSX) and please dont say go to hamachi.cc beacause thats where i have downloaded it from but i havent a clue what do to from thier, i have read the README (this may sound very noobish) but i dont know what a root account is to start and i cant run ./install, i have tryed to download the widget version but it looks like all it is a skin, i know people can get it to work and im probably a noob but i need the files to run the widget or a walkthrough on the other non-widget way, please help otherwise i am serverly boned ty.
>[glow=red,2,300]mr zammy pk[/glow]< ><((((("> - Teh fish

item.title: Need Hamachi Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Java The Real Java
item.description:
@The_Real_Java wrote:

go to add/remove program and delete it then re-install it again, thats what my friend did then it worked ?!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Hamachi Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Java The Real Java
item.description:
@The_Real_Java wrote:

i used to have hamachi on my server but now i have a no-ip, it doesnt mean i have to start saying hamachi is crap do i lol?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 02:03:23 PM[/size][hr][quote=“mr zammy pk, post:6, topic:19596”]lol, i need to use hamachi, im a mod on my favorite ptivate server and it turned hamachi… umm it says it doesnt know what what to do with it, it asks me to find the application to run it with, it asks me what to run it with, i try terminal nd it says no, im confuzzled[/quote]

go here to download it -> http://files.hamachi.cc/priv/HamachiSetup-1.0.0.62-en.exe

Read full topic
